means: 悲喜剧，又悲又喜的事情

sentence.Network_en: A lot of time to weave the story of the tragicomedy staged numerous.
sentence.Network_cn: 时间编织了许多的故事,上演了无数的悲喜剧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 悲字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 悲惜〖 sadandregretful〗 悲喜剧〖 tragicomedy;tragicomic〗 悲辛〖 heart-breaking;touching〗.

list.abs: they classified many classical tragicomedies into the category of tragedy.It brought about the confusion in the classification of Chinese classical drama .又因为对古典悲喜剧的价值认识不足，有意无意地将许多悲喜剧划入悲剧范畴，造成我国古典戏曲分类上的混乱。
generally classical tragicomedy has two climaxes , tradical climax and comedical climax .古典悲喜剧一般都有两个高潮，即悲剧高潮和喜剧高潮。
" Our tragicomedy continues " whispered a waiter in a Havana hotel .我们悲喜剧将会继续“，一个哈瓦那酒店的服务生小声地说。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French tragicomédie or Italian tragicomedia, based on Latin tragicocomoedia, from tragicus (see tragic) + comoedia (see comedy)

entry.def: A tragi-comedy is a play or other written work that is both sad and amusing.

means.word_mean: 1. a dramatic composition involving elements of both tragedy and comedy usually with the tragic predominating
2. a comedy with serious elements or overtones

auth_sentence.content: But the mission itself was a tragicomedy.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the mission itself was a tragicomedy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the mission itself was a tragicomedy.
